seriesJson.title: The American town: A self-portrait
seriesJson.description: Historical documentary series drawn from the recollections of senior citizens in a variety of American towns.

node.title: Bluegrass Country, part 1
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on life in Bluegrass Country. Features stories about horse raising, tobacco, bourbon, and other elements of the area around Lexington, Kentucky.

node.title: Bluegrass country, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on life in Bluegrass Country. Features stories about horse raising, tobacco, bourbon, and other elements of the area around Lexington, Kentucky.

node.title: Copper country: Part II, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on the Keweenaw Peninsula on Michigan's Upper Peninsula. Cultural life and ethnic groups are studied. Also includes the story of Father Baraga, a pioneer priest.

node.title: Copper country: Part II, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on the Keweenaw Peninsula on Michigan's Upper Peninsula. Cultural life and ethnic groups are studied. Also includes the story of Father Baraga, a pioneer priest.

node.title: Napoleon, Ohio, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on the town of Napoleon, Ohio. Topics covered inlcude the Miami and Erie Canal; farming methods; hatchery businesses; windmill manufacturing; and the women's suffrage movement. Includes an interview with a 102-year-old woman.

node.title: Napoleon, Ohio, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on the town of Napoleon, Ohio. Topics covered inlcude the Miami and Erie Canal; farming methods; hatchery businesses; windmill manufacturing; and the women's suffrage movement. Includes an interview with a 102-year-old woman.

node.title: Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, explores Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, where the rich heritage of the Pennsylvania Dutch Country dates to colonial times.

node.title: Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, explores Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, where the rich heritage of the Pennsylvania Dutch Country dates to colonial times.

node.title: Durand, Michigan, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on Durand, Michigan: Its story and success in changing to other industries in the face of declining railroad activity.

node.title: Durand, Michigan, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on Durand, Michigan: Its story and success in changing to other industries in the face of declining railroad activity.
